updates.title: Reinforcement learning with prediction-based rewards
updates.description: We’ve developed Random Network Distillation (RND), a prediction-based method for encouraging reinforcement learning agents to explore their environments through curiosity, which for the first time exceeds average human performance on Montezuma’s Revenge.

updates.title: Improving mathematical reasoning with process supervision
updates.description: We've trained a model to achieve a new state-of-the-art in mathematical problem solving by rewarding each correct step of reasoning (“process supervision”) instead of simply rewarding the correct final answer (“outcome supervision”). In addition to boosting performance relative to outcome supervision, process supervision also has an important alignment benefit: it directly trains the model to produce a chain-of-thought that is endorsed by humans.

updates.title: Building an early warning system for LLM-aided biological threat creation
updates.description: We’re developing a blueprint for evaluating the risk that a large language model (LLM) could aid someone in creating a biological threat. In an evaluation involving both biology experts and students, we found that GPT-4 provides at most a mild uplift in biological threat creation accuracy. While this uplift is not large enough to be conclusive, our finding is a starting point for continued research and community deliberation.

updates.title: Requests for Research 2.0
updates.description: We’re releasing a new batch of seven unsolved problems which have come up in the course of our research at OpenAI.

updates.title: DALL·E: Introducing outpainting
updates.description: Extend creativity and tell a bigger story with DALL·E images of any size.

updates.title: Introducing SimpleQA
updates.description: A factuality benchmark called SimpleQA that measures the ability for language models to answer short, fact-seeking questions.

updates.title: Introducing ChatGPT
updates.description: We’ve trained a model called ChatGPT which interacts in a conversational way. The dialogue format makes it possible for ChatGPT to answer followup questions, admit its mistakes, challenge incorrect premises, and reject inappropriate requests.

updates.title: OpenAI Fellows Fall 2018
updates.description: We’re now accepting applications for the next cohort of OpenAI Fellows, a program which offers a compensated 6-month apprenticeship in AI research at OpenAI.

updates.title: Benchmarking LLMs for global health
updates.description: Generative AI

updates.title: Sub-processor list
updates.description: Sub-processor list. This page provides information about the Sub-processors OpenAI has engaged to provide processing activities on Customer Data as defined in the OpenAI Data Processing Agreement.

updates.title: Sub-processor list—April 2025 update
updates.description: This page provides information about the Sub-processors OpenAI has engaged to provide processing activities on Customer Data as defined in the OpenAI Data Processing Agreement.

updates.title: Sam Altman returns as CEO, OpenAI has a new initial board
updates.description: Mira Murati as CTO, Greg Brockman returns as President. Read messages from CEO Sam Altman and board chair Bret Taylor.

updates.title: Automating customer support agents
updates.description: MavenAGI is a new software company for the AI era. They recently launched an AI customer service agent, built on the flexibility of GPT-4, which a number of companies like Tripadvisor, Clickup and Rho are already using to save time and better serve their customers.

updates.title: Automating customer support agents
updates.description: MavenAGI is a new software company for the AI era. They recently launched an AI customer service agent, built on the flexibility of GPT-4, which a number of companies like Tripadvisor, Clickup and Rho are already using to save time and better serve their customers.

updates.title: The Newsroom AI Catalyst: a global program with WAN-IFRA
updates.description: We’re collaborating with WAN-IFRA, the World Association of News Publishers, to launch a global accelerator program that will assist over 100 news publishers to explore and integrate AI in their newsroom.

updates.title: Enhancing news in ChatGPT with The Atlantic
updates.description: The Atlantic is announcing a strategic content and product partnership with OpenAI, which positions The Atlantic as a premium news source within OpenAI. The Atlantic’s articles will be discoverable within OpenAI’s products, including ChatGPT, and as a partner, The Atlantic will help to shape how news is surfaced and presented in future real-time discovery products.

updates.title: A Content and Product Partnership with Vox Media
updates.description: In a multi-faceted agreement, Vox Media’s content will enhance the output of OpenAI’s ChatGPT, and the company will build on OpenAI’s technology to develop products to better serve its audiences and advertisers.

updates.title: ChatDirector: Enhancing video conferencing with space-aware scene rendering and speech-driven layout transition
updates.description: Human-Computer Interaction and Visualization

updates.title: DALL·E now available without waitlist
updates.description: New users can start creating straight away. Lessons learned from deployment and improvements to our safety systems make wider availability possible.

updates.title: Part 3: Building an AI-powered assistant for investment research with multi-agent collaboration in Amazon Bedrock and Amazon Bedrock Data Automation
updates.description: In this post, we walk through how to build a multi-agent investment research assistant using the multi-agent collaboration capability of Amazon Bedrock. Our solution demonstrates how a team of specialized AI agents can work together to analyze financial news, evaluate stock performance, optimize portfolio allocations, and deliver comprehensive investment insights—all orchestrated through a unified, natural language interface.

updates.title: A generative AI prototype with Amazon Bedrock transforms life sciences and the genome analysis process
updates.description: This post explores deploying a text-to-SQL pipeline using generative AI models and Amazon Bedrock to ask natural language questions to a genomics database. We demonstrate how to implement an AI assistant web interface with AWS Amplify and explain the prompt engineering strategies adopted to generate the SQL queries. Finally, we present instructions to deploy the service in your own AWS account.

updates.title: Gemma 3 27B model now available on Amazon Bedrock Marketplace and Amazon SageMaker JumpStart
updates.description: We are excited to announce the availability of Gemma 3 27B Instruct models through Amazon Bedrock Marketplace and Amazon SageMaker JumpStart. In this post, we show you how to get started with Gemma 3 27B Instruct on both Amazon Bedrock Marketplace and SageMaker JumpStart, and how to use the model’s powerful instruction-following capabilities in your applications.

updates.title: Building a multimodal RAG based application using Amazon Bedrock Data Automation and Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases
updates.description: In this post, we walk through building a full-stack application that processes multimodal content using Amazon Bedrock Data Automation, stores the extracted information in an Amazon Bedrock knowledge base, and enables natural language querying through a RAG-based Q&A interface.

updates.title: Tailoring foundation models for your business needs: A comprehensive guide to RAG, fine-tuning, and hybrid approaches
updates.description: In this post, we show you how to implement and evaluate three powerful techniques for tailoring FMs to your business needs: RAG, fine-tuning, and a hybrid approach combining both methods. We provid ready-to-use code to help you experiment with these approaches and make informed decisions based on your specific use case and dataset.

updates.title: How Rufus doubled their inference speed and handled Prime Day traffic with AWS AI chips and parallel decoding
updates.description: Rufus, an AI-powered shopping assistant, relies on many components to deliver its customer experience including a foundation LLM (for response generation) and a query planner (QP) model for query classification and retrieval enhancement. This post focuses on how the QP model used draft centric speculative decoding (SD)—also called parallel decoding—with AWS AI chips to meet the demands of Prime Day. By combining parallel decoding with AWS Trainium and Inferentia chips, Rufus achieved two times faster response times, a 50% reduction in inference costs, and seamless scalability during peak traffic.

updates.title: Introducing OpenAI London
updates.description: We are excited to announce OpenAI’s first international expansion with a new office in London, United Kingdom.

updates.title: Faster physics in Python
updates.description: We’re open-sourcing a high-performance Python library for robotic simulation using the MuJoCo engine, developed over our past year of robotics research.

updates.title: Introducing Triton: Open-source GPU programming for neural networks
updates.description: We’re releasing Triton 1.0, an open-source Python-like programming language which enables researchers with no CUDA experience to write highly efficient GPU code—most of the time on par with what an expert would be able to produce.

updates.title: OpenAI’s comment to the NTIA on open model weights
updates.description:
OpenAI’s comment to the NTIA on open model weights

This comment was submitted by OpenAI in response to NTIA’s March 2024 Request for Information on Dual-Use Foundation Models with Widely Available Weights.

updates.title: OpenAI Gym Beta
updates.description: We’re releasing the public beta of OpenAI Gym, a toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning (RL) algorithms. It consists of a growing suite of environments (from simulated robots to Atari games), and a site for comparing and reproducing results.

updates.title: Security on the path to AGI
updates.description: At OpenAI, we proactively adapt, including by building comprehensive security measures directly into our infrastructure and models.

updates.title: Rich human feedback for text-to-image generation
updates.description: Generative AI

updates.title: Frontier Model Forum
updates.description: We’re forming a new industry body to promote the safe and responsible development of frontier AI systems: advancing AI safety research, identifying best practices and standards, and facilitating information sharing among policymakers and industry.

updates.title: Frontier Model Forum updates
updates.description: Together with Anthropic, Google, and Microsoft, we’re announcing the new Executive Director of the Frontier Model Forum and a new $10 million AI Safety Fund.

updates.title: Adversarial training methods for semi-supervised text classification
Team update
updates.description: We’d like to welcome the latest set of team members to OpenAI (and we’re still hiring!)

updates.title: OpenAI Scholars 2018: Meet our Scholars
updates.description: Our first class of OpenAI Scholars is underway, and you can now follow along as this group of experienced software developers becomes machine learning practitioners.

updates.title: OpenAI Baselines: DQN
updates.description: We’re open-sourcing OpenAI Baselines, our internal effort to reproduce reinforcement learning algorithms with performance on par with published results. We’ll release the algorithms over upcoming months; today’s release includes DQN and three of its variants.

updates.title: Improving Model Safety Behavior with Rule-Based Rewards
updates.description: We've developed and applied a new method leveraging Rule-Based Rewards (RBRs) that aligns models to behave safely without extensive human data collection.

updates.title: Our approach to alignment research
updates.description: We are improving our AI systems’ ability to learn from human feedback and to assist humans at evaluating AI. Our goal is to build a sufficiently aligned AI system that can help us solve all other alignment problems.

updates.title: Introducing ChatGPT and Whisper APIs
updates.description: Developers can now integrate ChatGPT and Whisper models into their apps and products through our API.

updates.title: GPT-4 API general availability and deprecation of older models in the Completions API
updates.description: GPT-3.5 Turbo, DALL·E and Whisper APIs are also generally available, and we are releasing a deprecation plan for older models of the Completions API, which will retire at the beginning of 2024.

updates.title: Accelerating the development of life-saving treatments
updates.description: Accelerating the development of life-saving treatments.

updates.title: Scalable self-improvement for compiler optimization
updates.description: Algorithms & Theory

updates.title: Simplifying, stabilizing, and scaling continuous-time consistency models
updates.description: We’ve simplified, stabilized, and scaled continuous-time consistency models, achieving comparable sample quality to leading diffusion models, while using only two sampling steps.

updates.title: Introducing Mobility AI: Advancing urban transportation
updates.description: Algorithms & Theory

updates.title: Introducing our latest image generation model in the API
updates.description: Our latest image generation model is now available in the API via ‘gpt-image-1’—enabling developers and businesses to build professional-grade, customizable visuals directly into their own tools and platforms.

updates.title: A landmark multi-year global partnership with News Corp
updates.description: Companies Join Forces to Enrich OpenAI’s Generative AI Products and Platforms with Premium Journalism

updates.title: LANISTR: Multimodal learning from structured and unstructured data
updates.description: Machine Intelligence

updates.title: Bertelsmann powers creativity and productivity with OpenAI
updates.description: Bertelsmann, the global media, services, and education company headquartered in Germany, will integrate OpenAI’s technology across multiple brands around the world.

updates.title: Trading inference-time compute for adversarial robustness
updates.description: Trading Inference-Time Compute for Adversarial Robustness

updates.title: Parfait: Enabling private AI with research tools
updates.description: Distributed Systems & Parallel Computing

updates.title: Introducing Whisper
updates.description: We’ve trained and are open-sourcing a neural net called Whisper that approaches human level robustness and accuracy on English speech recognition.

updates.title: Integrate Amazon Bedrock Agents with Slack
updates.description: In this post, we present a solution to incorporate Amazon Bedrock Agents in your Slack workspace. We guide you through configuring a Slack workspace, deploying integration components in Amazon Web Services, and using this solution.

updates.title: Secure distributed logging in scalable multi-account deployments using Amazon Bedrock and LangChain
updates.description: In this post, we present a solution for securing distributed logging multi-account deployments using Amazon Bedrock and LangChain.

updates.title: New tools and features in the Responses API
updates.description: New features in the Responses API: Remote MCP, image gen, Code Interpreter, and more. Powering faster, smarter agents with GPT-4o & o-series models, plus new features for reliability and efficiency.

updates.title: Sam & Jony introduce io
updates.description: Building a family of AI products for everyone.

updates.title: Faulty reward functions in the wild
updates.description: Reinforcement learning algorithms can break in surprising, counterintuitive ways. In this post we’ll explore one failure mode, which is where you misspecify your reward function.

updates.title: Restoring speaker voices with zero-shot cross-lingual voice transfer for TTS
updates.description: Human-Computer Interaction and Visualization

updates.title: Speculative RAG: Enhancing retrieval augmented generation through drafting
updates.description: Generative AI

updates.title: Building smarter maps with GPT-4o vision fine-tuning
updates.description: Building smarter maps with GPT-4o vision fine-tuning

updates.title: Scaling wearable foundation models
updates.description: Generative AI

updates.title: DALL·E now available in beta
updates.description: We’ll invite 1 million people from our waitlist over the coming weeks. Users can create with DALL·E using free credits that refill every month, and buy additional credits in 115-generation increments for $15.

updates.title: Scaling laws for reward model overoptimization
Accelerating scientific breakthroughs with an AI co-scientist
updates.description: Generative AI

updates.title: OpenAI Fellows Summer 2018: Final projects
updates.description: Our first cohort of OpenAI Fellows has concluded, with each Fellow going from a machine learning beginner to core OpenAI contributor in the course of a 6-month apprenticeship.

updates.title: Whistles, songs, boings, and biotwangs: Recognizing whale vocalizations with AI
updates.description: Climate & Sustainability

updates.title: Asymmetric actor critic for image-based robot learning
Sim-to-real transfer of robotic control with dynamics randomization
DALL·E 2 research preview update
updates.description: Early users have created over 3 million images to date and helped us improve our safety processes. We’re excited to begin adding up to 1,000 new users from our waitlist each week.

updates.title: OpenAI Five Benchmark
updates.description: The OpenAI Five Benchmark match is now over!

updates.title: Evolved Policy Gradients
updates.description: We’re releasing an experimental metalearning approach called Evolved Policy Gradients, a method that evolves the loss function of learning agents, which can enable fast training on novel tasks. Agents trained with EPG can succeed at basic tasks at test time that were outside their training regime, like learning to navigate to an object on a different side of the room from where it was placed during training.

updates.title: How generational differences affect consumer attitudes towards ads
updates.description: Our research study, in collaboration with CrowdDNA, aims to understand people's relationship with social media ads across different social media platforms.

updates.title: Image GPT
updates.description: We find that, just as a large transformer model trained on language can generate coherent text, the same exact model trained on pixel sequences can generate coherent image completions and samples. By establishing a correlation between sample quality and image classification accuracy, we show that our best generative model also contains features competitive with top convolutional nets in the unsupervised setting.

updates.title: Prover-Verifier Games improve legibility of language model outputs
updates.description: desc

updates.title: HDR photo editing with machine learning
updates.description: Machine Perception

updates.title: AI and compute
updates.description: We’re releasing an analysis showing that since 2012, the amount of compute used in the largest AI training runs has been increasing exponentially with a 3.4-month doubling time (by comparison, Moore’s Law had a 2-year doubling period)[^footnote-correction]. Since 2012, this metric has grown by more than 300,000x (a 2-year doubling period would yield only a 7x increase). Improvements in compute have been a key component of AI progress, so as long as this trend continues, it’s worth preparing for the implications of systems far outside today’s capabilities.

updates.title: OpenAI acquires Global Illumination
updates.description: The entire team has joined OpenAI.

updates.title: More on Dota 2
updates.description: Our Dota 2 result shows that self-play can catapult the performance of machine learning systems from far below human level to superhuman, given sufficient compute. In the span of a month, our system went from barely matching a high-ranked player to beating the top pros and has continued to improve since then. Supervised deep learning systems can only be as good as their training datasets, but in self-play systems, the available data improves automatically as the agent gets better.

updates.title: Thinking with images
updates.description: OpenAI o3 and o4-mini represent a significant breakthrough in visual perception by reasoning with images in their chain of thought.

updates.title: Introducing OpenAI o3 and o4-mini
updates.description: Our smartest and most capable models to date with full tool access

updates.title: OpenAI o3 and o4-mini System Card
updates.description: OpenAI o3 and OpenAI o4-mini combine state-of-the-art reasoning with full tool capabilities—web browsing, Python, image and file analysis, image generation, canvas, automations, file search, and memory.

updates.title: Emergence of grounded compositional language in multi-agent populations
Partnering with Axios expands OpenAI’s work with the news industry
updates.description: Publishers representing hundreds of newsrooms and content brands are using OpenAI partnerships and grant programs to adopt AI tools and strengthen the news ecosystem, while ChatGPT users gain access to information from leading, reliable publications.

updates.title: Deeper insights into retrieval augmented generation: The role of sufficient context
updates.description: Data Mining & Modeling

updates.title: AI powers Expedia’s marketing evolution
updates.description: A conversation with Jochen Koedijk, Chief Marketing Officer of Expedia Group.

updates.title: Disrupting malicious uses of AI by state-affiliated threat actors
updates.description: We terminated accounts associated with state-affiliated threat actors. Our findings show our models offer only limited, incremental capabilities for malicious cybersecurity tasks.

updates.title: Awakening Sleeping Beauties at The Met
updates.description: AI can enrich lives through beauty and creativity, and its artistic potential shines in "Sleeping Beauties: Reawakening Fashion," a collaborative exhibit from The Met's Costume Institute.

updates.title: Introducing OpenAI Dublin
updates.description: We’re growing our presence in Europe with an office in Dublin, Ireland.

updates.title: Learning with opponent-learning awareness
Can algorithms make tournament cheating obsolete?

updates.title: Mapping the ionosphere with the power of Android

updates.title: A Student’s Guide to Writing with ChatGPT
updates.description: A Student’s Guide to Writing with ChatGPT

updates.title: Data-driven beauty and creativity with ChatGPT
updates.description: Data-driven beauty: How The Estée Lauder Companies unlocks insights with ChatGPT

updates.title: Saving lives with AI health coaching
updates.description: Healthify collaborates with OpenAI to improve millions of lives with sustainable weight loss.

updates.title: Global news partnerships: Le Monde and Prisa Media
updates.description: We have partnered with international news organizations Le Monde and Prisa Media to bring French and Spanish news content to ChatGPT.

updates.title: OpenAI Scholars 2019: Meet our Scholars
updates.description: Our class of eight scholars (out of 550 applicants) brings together collective expertise in literature, philosophy, cell biology, statistics, economics, quantum physics, and business innovation.

updates.title: Online math tutoring service uses AI to help boost students’ skills and confidence
updates.description: The post Online math tutoring service uses AI to help boost students’ skills and confidence appeared first on The AI Blog.

updates.title: Partnership with Axel Springer to deepen beneficial use of AI in journalism
updates.description: Axel Springer is the first publishing house globally to partner with us on a deeper integration of journalism in AI technologies.

updates.title: Measuring Goodhart’s law
updates.description: Goodhart’s law famously says: “When a measure becomes a target, it ceases to be a good measure.” Although originally from economics, it’s something we have to grapple with at OpenAI when figuring out how to optimize objectives that are difficult or costly to measure.
